task.title: How to flood a cookie
task.shortdesc: There are multiple ways to flood a cookie, but we'll teach you the currently preferred style. This style requires you to outline the cookie with flood icing, and then immediately fill it in.

context.p: This is the first step to decorating beautiful sugar cookies.

step.cmd: Outline the portion of the cookie you want to flood using a piping bag full of flooding icing.
Immediately fill inside of the outline with same icing.
Gently pull icing out to cookie's edges using a scribe tool.
Pop air bubbles and close frosting gaps with scribe tool.
If needed, level your icing by gently shaking cookie side-to-side.
